org.domainobject.animation.sp.arrayobject

Interface _IndexedMemory<T extends ArrayObject>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    _Memory<T>, java.lang.Iterable<T>
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    _IndexedMemoryFast<T>, _IndexedMemoryLazy<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    IndexedMemoryLazy

    public interface _IndexedMemory<T extends ArrayObject>
extends _Memory<T>
    Indexed memory is the type of memory you would use if you want to feed indexed array buffers to your shader program using glDrawElements. Indexed memory produces a ShaderInput object that contains both an array buffer and an element array buffer.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.Class<?> getIndexType()
      Get the type of the indices in the element array buffer.

      • Methods inherited from interface java.lang.Iterable

        forEach, iterator, spliterator

    • Method Detail

      • getIndexType

        java.lang.Class<?> getIndexType()
        Get the type of the indices in the element array buffer. Will be either byte.class or short.class or int.class.
        Returns:
        The type of the indices in the element array buffer
